unnormalised: Hey folks, ever wondered where all that Diwali mithai packaging goes? Well, let's talk waste management!
normalised: Hey folks, ever wondered where all that Diwali mithai packaging goes? Well, let's talk waste management!

unnormalised: The IIT-Delhi recently announced a breakthrough in converting plastic waste into usable fuel. Imagine, that mountain of plastic at the Ghazipur landfill turning into petrol! A 'Swacch Bharat' dream come true, right?
normalised: The I I T-Delhi recently announced a breakthrough in converting plastic waste into usable fuel. Imagine, that mountain of plastic at the Ghazipur landfill turning into petrol! A 'Swacch Bharat' dream come true, right?

unnormalised: Mumbai, a city that generates a staggering 7,500 metric tonnes of waste daily, is facing a serious challenge. Think of it as the 'Don' movie - but the villain is overflowing garbage!
normalised: Mumbai, a city that generates a staggering seven thousand five hundred metric tonnes of waste daily, is facing a serious challenge. Think of it as the 'Don' movie - but the villain is overflowing garbage!

unnormalised: Local authorities in Chennai are piloting a new door-to-door segregation program, hoping to ease the burden on the Kodungaiyur dump yard. It's a long road, but every little bit helps.
normalised: Local authorities in Chennai are piloting a new door-to-door segregation program, hoping to ease the burden on the Kodungaiyur dump yard. It's a long road, but every little bit helps.

unnormalised: Small towns like Kanpur are also stepping up, promoting composting and reducing single-use plastics. Remember, folks, every 'kachra' item is a resource in disguise! Let's all do our bit for a cleaner Bharat!
normalised: Small towns like Kanpur are also stepping up, promoting composting and reducing single-use plastics. Remember, folks, every 'kachra' item is a resource in disguise! Let's all do our bit for a cleaner Bharat!
